channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Agtonomy adds $10M to Series A round to scale West Coast team
item.description: Agtonomy said it will use the funding to further develop its autonomy software for agricultural equipment and to expand to new markets. The post Agton...

item.title: Oil prices inch higher after biggest one-day rout in over 2 years
item.description: Oil futures inched higher on Tuesday, finding support a day after suffering their largest daily percentage decline in more than two years.

item.title: Job openings in the U.S. fall to the lowest level in 3 1/2 years
item.description: U.S. job openings fell in September to a three-and-a-half year low as as the demand for labor ebbed and businesses waited for the economy to speed up.

item.title: If Musk and Trump want to cut federal spending by $2 trillion, they’ll have to come for Social Security and Medicare
item.description: Musk is talking big cuts. Something’s got to give.

item.title: U.S. consumer confidence surges in October to highest level in nine months

item.title: Universal strikes AI data training deal, still suing AI companies for using it’s data
item.description: Universal Music Group inked a deal with AI startup Klay to help develop a "responsible and ethical" AI model for music.

item.title: AI will add to the e-waste problem. Here’s what we can do about it.

item.title: Gartner predicts AI agents will transform work, but disillusionment is growing
item.description: Gen AI is one of the hottest and hyped topics today. However, enterprise leaders are becoming skeptical about its near-term usefulness.

item.title: Enterprise AI moves from ‘experiment’ to ‘essential,’ spending jumps 130%
item.description: Wharton research shows dramatic surge in enterprise AI adoption, with spending up 130% and smaller companies leading in implementation rates.

item.title: Epic Games CEO Tim Sweeney’s path to the open metaverse is via enlightened self-interest
item.description: To get to the open metaverse, Epic Games CEO Tim Sweeney wants platforms to embrace enlightened self-interest.
